mapper.sql: ITEM_OID, ITEM_DESC, AMOUNT, OWNER_OID, CPN_OID, CATEGORY_OID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CONSUMPTION_ITEM( ITEM_DESC, AMOUNT, OWNER_OID, CPN_OID, CATEGORY_OID) VALUES ( #{itemDesc,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{ownerOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cpnOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{categoryOid,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.select: SELECT OWNER_OID, CATEGORY_OID, SUM(I.AMOUNT) AS TOTAL FROM CONSUMPTION_ITEM I, CONSUMPTION C WHERE I.CPN_OID = C.CPN_OID AND C.CONFIRMED = TRUE AND C.CPN_TIME >= #{start,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND C.CPN_TIME <= #{end,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} GROUP BY OWNER_OID, CATEGORY_OID
